name: Hindi OCR - Context-Aware vs Baseline
description: Comparing baseline Hindi OCR prompt against context-aware prompt that leverages linguistic patterns and common Hindi word structures to improve accuracy on handwritten Devanagari text.
hypothesis: Adding context awareness and pattern recognition instructions will improve OCR accuracy by 15% on handwritten text because the model will use surrounding words to disambiguate unclear characters.
